languages.text: "Моему слуху мало что удалось разобрать из говора этого мон-кай, но ясно одно — его поселению требуется помощь. Не то чтобы мне есть дело до нужд низших существ... Я просто возвращаю долг за боль, причиненную этому миру моими собратьями".

traits.locale_text: "Моему слуху мало что удалось разобрать из говора этого мон-кай, но ясно одно — его поселению требуется помощь. Не то чтобы мне есть дело до нужд низших существ... Я просто возвращаю долг за боль, причиненную этому миру моими собратьями".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."
languages.original_text: "Моему слуху мало что удалось разобрать из говора этого мон-кай, но ясно одно — его поселению требуется помощь. Не то чтобы мне есть дело до нужд низших существ... Я просто возвращаю долг за боль, причиненную этому миру моими собратьями".

traits.locale_text: "I could hardly understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. It's not like I have any care for the needs of the primitive creature... I'm simply paying the reparations for the pain that my brethren had brought upon this world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could hardly understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. It's not like I have any care for the needs of the primitive creature... I'm simply paying the reparations for the pain that my brethren had brought upon this world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could hardly understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. It's not like I have any care for the needs of the primitive creature... I'm simply paying the reparations for the pain that my brethren had brought upon this world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could hardly understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. It's not like I have any care for the needs of the primitive creature... I'm simply paying the reparations for the pain that my brethren had brought upon this world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No he entendido casi nada de lo que ha dicho este mon-keigh, pero una cosa está clara: su asentamiento necesita ayuda. Me son indiferentes las necesidades de una criatura primitiva... tan solo pretendo compensar el sufrimiento que han causado mis hermanos en este mundo».
languages.original_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."

traits.locale_text: «No he entendido casi nada de lo que ha dicho este mon-keigh, pero una cosa está clara: su asentamiento necesita ayuda. Tampoco es que me importen mucho las necesidades de una criatura primitiva... sencillamente pretendo compensar el sufrimiento que han causado mis hermanos en este mundo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我几乎听不懂这只猴子说了些什么，但有件事情我听得很清楚，他们的定居点需要帮助。我并不在乎这些原始生物的安危……但我的族人为这个世界带来了那么多痛苦，我只是想弥补他们的过错。”
languages.original_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."

traits.locale_text: “我几乎听不懂这只猴子说了些什么，但有件事情我听得很清楚，他们的定居点需要帮助。我并不在乎这些原始生物的需求……但我的族人为这个世界带来了那么多痛苦，我只想弥补他们的过错。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas bien compris ce qu'a dit ce mon-keigh, mais une chose semble claire : son village a besoin d'aide. Je me moque bien des vicissitudes de ces créatures primitives... mais je tiens à racheter le mal que mes semblables ont fait subir à ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas bien compris ce qu'a dit ce mon-keigh, mais une chose semble claire : son village a besoin d'aide. Ce n'est pas que je me soucie des problèmes de ces créatures primitives... Je veux simplement racheter le mal que mes semblables ont fait subir à ce monde. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「このモン＝ケイの言葉は、ほとんど理解できなかったが、ひとつはっきりしているのは、彼らの集落には助けが必要だということだ。原始的な生物の苦悩など気にもならないが…私はただ、私のキンがこの世界にもたらした苦痛の負債を払っているだけだ」
languages.original_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."

traits.locale_text: 「このモン＝ケイの言葉は、ほとんど理解できなかったが、ひとつはっきりしているのは、彼らの集落には助けが必要だということだ。原始的な生物の苦悩など気にもならないが…私はただ、私のキンがこの世界にもたらした苦痛の負債を払っているだけだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich konnte die Worte dieses Chem-Pan-Sey kaum verstehen, doch eines ist sicher: Seine Siedlung braucht Hilfe. Mich scheren die Sorgen dieser primitiven Kreaturen wenig ... Ich bezahle lediglich die Reparationen für die Schmerzen, die meine Verwandten dieser Welt zugefügt haben."
languages.original_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."

traits.locale_text: "Ich konnte die Worte dieses Chem-Pan-Sey kaum verstehen, doch eines ist sicher: Seine Siedlung braucht Hilfe. Nicht, dass mich die Bedürfnisse der primitiven Kreatur scheren würden ... Ich bezahle lediglich die Reparationen für die Schmerzen, die meine Brüder dieser Welt zugefügt haben."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu mon-keigh'in söylediklerini zar zor anlayabiliyorum ama tek bir şey ortada. Yerleşim yerlerinin yardıma ihtiyacı var. Bu ilkel yaratıkların kederlerini pek umursamıyorum... Yalnızca soydaşlarımın bu dünyaya yaşattıkları acıları telafi etmeye çalışıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I could barely understand the speech of this mon-keigh, but one thing is clear — their settlement needs help. I care little about the woes of those primitive creatures... I am simply paying reparations for the pain that my kin have brought upon this world."
